rubric.description:
Submission Type:  PDF
Review Time Estimate: 20 minutes
Description: Evaluate a Display Ad Campaign

### [DMND Reviewers Handbook](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gILVtaotovaqd1hc8b7fBwnBQNdKJlbq-agyvbOicI8/edit?usp=sharing)
### [Evaluate a Display Ad Campaign Reviewers Guide](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1dur9HbKWmldYPJehKEmCbzpnZiRaAImtCcUwDh4w_SI/edit?usp=sharing)

**Project Description/Requirements**: (this is what students see)

# Evaluate a Display Advertising Campaign
### Evaluate a Display Ad Campaign   

Make a copy of this [Google slide template](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1knFoX_DUPWD5KfN8ibrg1M3S071_wr86oorn4mC6Mrw/edit#slide=id.g1d93cc3259_0_6) and complete each section. When you are ready, save your file as a PDF and submit it here.

The submissions slide template includes three sections: 
1. Evaluate the display image campaign for DMND
2. Evaluate the video ad campaign for DMND 
3. Provide recommendations for future campaigns

### Part 1: Evaluate the Display Image Campaign for DMND
1. Present the data and calculate the ROI of the Ad overall 
2. Evaluate which Ad performed best?
3. Determine which Keywords performed best?
4. Provide at least **three** suggestions on how you would optimize this ad campaign

### Part 2: Evaluate the Video Ad Campaign for DMND 
1. Present the data and calculate the ROI of the Ad overall 
2. Evaluate which Ad performed best?
3. Determine which Keywords performed best?
4. Provide at least **three** suggestions on how you would optimize this ad campaign

### Part 3: Future Campaign Recommendations 
Once you have completed your campaign evaluation, we ask you to outline what you would do if you had additional campaign budget. Again, feel free to use bullet points for your evaluation and structure it in any way that works for you. You can use as many slides as you want for your evaluation. We have prepared a few questions that you can use to structure your recommendations, but this serves only as a guide:

1. Which digital channel or campaign performed best?
2. Based on the results, which channel would you further invest in the future?
3. What further optimization would you do to this ad campaign? (Ad creative, keywords, ad copy, landing pages, offers, etc…)

## Submission
Once you have completed all the slides, including the final section that contains your screenshot, be sure to convert your slides into a PDF and submit it below. 

It's straightforward to convert a PowerPoint presentation into a pdf on a PC or Mac. If you used a Google Slides, simply click on File >> Download as...>> and choose pdf.

## Rubric
You can reference this project's [rubric](https://review.udacity.com/#!/rubrics/773/view) to review what your submission should include.
